SEARCH
Package battleship.model

Class ShipModel

java.lang.Object
battleship.model.ShipModel
public class ShipModel extends Object
Represents a ship in the Battleship game.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ShipModel

      public ShipModel(LocalizationLoader loader, String name, int length)
      Constructs a ShipModel with the specified name and length.
      Parameters:
      loader - The localization loader instance to load game resources.
      name - The name of the ship.
      length - The length of the ship.

  • Method Details

    • addCoordinate

      public void addCoordinate(int row, int col)
      Adds a coordinate to the list of coordinates occupied by the ship.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate to add.
      col - The column coordinate to add.

    • getCoordinateHead

      public CoordinateModel getCoordinateHead()
      Retrieves the coordinate of the head of the ship.
      Returns:
      The coordinate of the head of the ship.

    • getCoordinates

      public List<CoordinateModel> getCoordinates()
      Retrieves the list of coordinates occupied by the ship.
      Returns:
      The list of coordinates.

    • getHits

      public int getHits()
      Retrieves the number of hits received by the ship.
      Returns:
      The number of hits received.

    • getLength

      public int getLength()
      Retrieves the length of the ship.
      Returns:
      The length of the ship.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the ship.
      Returns:
      The name of the ship.

    • isHorizontal

      public boolean isHorizontal()
      Checks if the ship is oriented horizontally on the grid.
      Returns:
      true if the ship is horizontal, false if vertical.

    • isPlaced

      public boolean isPlaced()
      Checks if the ship has been placed on the grid.
      Returns:
      true if the ship is placed, false otherwise.

    • isSunk

      public boolean isSunk()
      Checks if the ship has been sunk.
      Returns:
      true if the ship has been sunk (hits >= length), false otherwise.

    • setController

      public void setController(BattleshipController controller)
      Sets the controller of the ship.
      Parameters:
      controller - The BattleshipController instance to set.

    • setCoordinateHead

      public void setCoordinateHead(CoordinateModel coordinateHead)
      Sets the coordinate of the head of the ship.
      Parameters:
      coordinateHead - The coordinate of the head of the ship.

    • setHits

      public void setHits(int hits)
      Sets the number of hits received by the ship.
      Parameters:
      hits - The new number of hits received.

    • setHorizontal

      public void setHorizontal(boolean horizontal)
      Sets the orientation of the ship on the grid.
      Parameters:
      horizontal - true for horizontal orientation, false for vertical.

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the ship.
      Parameters:
      name - The new name of the ship.

    • setPlaced

      public void setPlaced(boolean placed)
      Sets whether the ship is placed on the grid or not.
      Parameters:
      placed - true to place the ship, false otherwise.

    • registerHit

      public boolean registerHit(int row, int col)
      Checks if the given coordinates are part of this ship and registers a hit if they are.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate to check.
      col - The column coordinate to check.
      Returns:
      true if the coordinates are part of this ship and a hit was registered, false otherwise.
